title: AdventureWorks Sales Dashboard
summary: Business intelligence report analyzing revenue, customers, and product performance across regions. Built using Power BI semantic model.
process: Explored model relationships between sales, geography, products, and customers
Created DAX measures for revenue, profit, YoY growth, and customer segmentation
Designed interactive visuals with drill-down paths for product and territory analysis
Built slicers to enable quick filtering by date, segment, or region
Published report and documented findings for business stakeholders
impact: Delivered a clear view of business performance across multiple dimensions
Highlighted top-performing SKUs and underperforming territories
Showcased BI storytelling and DAX proficiency
